component.name: Shippy1984
component.summary: Space invaders / Galaxians like game with powerups

description.p: Shippy1984 is a small game designed to bring back nostalgia for the ways games used to be made--addicting as hell! Mash buttons on your way to the high score!
Shippy1984 is designed from the ground up for the avid casual gamer who feels left behind by the technological overload of today's games! No longer! Shippy1984 is the game you have been waiting for!
